dcterms:creator: R. Wardle
dcterms:description: A dataset providing basic profiling of domestic smart meter customers, used to analyze energy consumption patterns.
dcterms:title: Customer Led Network Revolution (CLNR)

dcterms:creator: R. Wardle
dcterms:description: A dataset providing enhanced profiling of domestic customers with solar photovoltaics (PV), used to study the impact of solar energy on consumption.
dcterms:title: Enhanced Profiling of Domestic Customers with Solar Photovoltaics (PV)

dcterms:creator: Department for Transport
dcterms:description: A comprehensive survey providing data on travel patterns across England from 2002 to 2017, useful for understanding mobility trends.
dcterms:title: National Travel Survey (NTS)

dcterms:creator: C. Crozier
D. Apostolopoulou
M. McCulloch
dcterms:description: A dataset containing numerical analysis of national travel data to assess the impact of UK fleet electrification.
dcterms:title: EV energy consumption factors
